thread.title: NHS in financial crisis after posting £1 billion loses in just three months
thread.title_full: NHS in financial crisis after posting £1 billion loses in just three months - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: NHS in financial crisis after posting £1 billion loses in just three months
text: NHS trusts in England have racked up a deficit approaching £1 billion in the first three months of the financial year - the "worst" financial position "in a generation", regulators have said. The figures for April to June showed NHS Foundation Trusts had a deficit of £445 million. Other NHS trusts ended the first quarter of the year £485 million in deficit. The foundation trust sector is "under massive pressure" and can no longer afford to go on as it is, the financial regulator Monitor said. This article will be updated shortly More about: NHS
